• Breastfeeding is 
sometimes used as a 
method of contraception. 
If	you	definitely	don’t	
want to have another 
baby just yet, it is best to 
use other more reliable 
methods of contraception 
which are suitable while 
breastfeeding.
• Keeping you and baby 
together at night is 
important as it makes it 
easier for you to feed baby 
in a respo
